Rule.Name: Require suppressions to have justification
Rule.Description: If an analysis warning is to be overridden, there should be a reason why.
Rule.Resolution: Specify a reason why the code for {0} could not be brought into conformance with the appropriate rule. Must be > 10 characters.

Rule.Name: Do not lose stack details from indirect explicit rethrows
Rule.Description: If an exception is re-raised, wrap it or use implicit "throw;" to preserve the stack details.
Rule.Resolution: Do not throw an explicit pre-existing exception.
